text: int getint ( ) { char n = 0 , c ; do { c = getchar_unlocked ( ) ; } while ( ( c < '0' || c > '9' ) && c != EOF ) ; if ( c == EOF ) { return 0 ; } do { n = ( n << 3 ) + ( n << 1 ) + c - '0' ; } while ( ( c = getchar_unlocked ( ) ) >= '0' && c <= '9' ) ; return n ; } void GetSum ( int arr [ ] [ 100 ] , int r , int c , int tr , int sum , int * maxsum ) { if ( r > tr - 1 || c > r ) return ; sum += arr [ r ] [ c ] ; if ( sum > * maxsum ) * maxsum = sum ; GetSum ( arr , r + 1 , c , tr , sum , maxsum ) ; GetSum ( arr , r + 1 , c + 1 , tr , sum , maxsum ) ; } int main ( void ) { int sum , t , n , i , j , arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; t = getint ( ) ; while ( t -- ) { n = getint ( ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { arr [ i ] [ j ] = getint ( ) ; } } sum = 0 ; GetSum ( arr , 0 , 0 , n , 0 , & sum ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
